title: Spellcasting Ability
content: of CR 2 to 8 fey of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl). Druid, Ranger Death Ward Lvl 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot No When the target drops to 0 hp for the first time, it automatically returns to 1 hp. Cleric, Death Domain, Life Domain, Paladin, Undying, Grave Domain, Ambition Domain Dimension Door Lvl 4 Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot No Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium.Melee Bard, Trickery Domain, Oath
